game_name: In SPACE no one can hear you CLICK
game_description: *Enter* an experimental keyboard and run out of the space bar, testing the keys you find along the way. Swing your arms around to push and jump off surfaces, and explore the mysterious insides of the keyboard.
review_1: This came before no more rainbows, it's similar but with a different theme and floaty jumping. I really enjoyed my time with this, its a tough one though!
review_2: Very creative game!! Great to see a some highly original content in VR!!
review_3: This is a short but sweet experience that I would totally recommend. If you have finished the game, just play it aGaim and look for ths Other emdigs. GybSorry, cat on my keyboard.
